description:
View transcripts, exhibits, and video created with the RealLegal line of products.

E-Transcript Bundle Viewer allows anyone to view transcripts, exhibits, and video created with the RealLegal line of products.
Use E-Transcript Bundle Viewer to open and work with E-Transcript .ptx files, E-Transcript .ptz Bundles and related exhibits, and Portable Exhibit .pex files.
No subscription is required to download and use this free software.
